comments.body: The commit message of https://github.com/lampepfl/dotty/pull/1482/commits/36648547105bc8ac53dd63a03821a27243af13cd explains why merging is needed but this is tricky enough that it should also be explained in a comment here.

      if (targetState.constraint eq previousConstraint) constraint
      else targetState.constraint & constraint
    constraint foreachTypeVar { tvar =>
      if (tvar.owningState eq this)

comments.body: Good point. I'll roll that into the next PR.

diffHunk:

   */
  def uncommittedAncestor: TyperState =
    if (!isCommitted || !parent.isDefined) this
